pages.title: Infusion of Light
pages.description: The Infusion of Light gives creatures the power to transform light to create solid barriers and become invisible. The abilities available through the Infusion are utilized with various controls using a $(l:artifacts/tools/witches_hand)Witches Hand$(/l)

pages.title: Invisibility
pages.description: A player infused with this Infusion can become invisible at will by simply holding right-click.$(br)Some Witches' clothing and tools become invisible together with the wearer.

pages.title: Light Barriers
pages.description: The Infused player can create barriers out of thin air. Barriers are solid, but disappear after a short while.$(br)$(8)> $()Sneak-use on top of a block creates a 3x3 barrier.$(br)$(8)> $()Sneak-use on the side of a block to create a bridge.$(br)$(8)> $()Sneak-use on a creature to encase them in a barrier.$(br)$(8)> $()Punch a creature to toss them into the air and create a barrier around them.
